translations: v．使醒悟，纠正（某人的错误观念）：从错误的信仰或观念中解救某人。

sentences.sentence: We are good at thinking, researching, investigating, communicating, abstracting, summarizing and disabusing; and we all work together to make great performance.
sentences.translation: 本真人善于思考、研究、调研，善于沟通、团结、合作，善于概括、提炼、解惑，更善于执行、表现和行为。
